title: Telenor Management Trainee Program
description:
**Looking for a workplace for the future?** 
  

  

  

  

 At Telenor, you own your career. Here, you’ll have the opportunity to make the most of your dreams and expertise while contributing to technological innovations that are barely even imagined today. Innovations that we know will change the map for how we communicate and live our connected lives in the future. Are you looking for a workplace where you can make a difference in what matters most – relationships between people? Welcome to Telenor!
   

  

  

  

**Telenor Trainee Program** 
  

  

  

  

 Our Trainee Program is an exciting opportunity within Telenor Sweden, offering a unique opportunity to combine strategic initiatives, theoretical learnings, and practical experience. We offer you an exciting year within a fast-paced environment in which your personal development is front and center. By combining your daily work with trainings in relevant subjects, you will build a solid foundation to succeed within Telenor as well as grow as a professional.
   

  

 During the program, you will have the opportunity to build a strong network throughout the organization, as well as become a member of Telenor Sweden's community for trainees. For the right person, the trainee program will open great opportunities within Telenor Group.
   

  

 As a Management Trainee, you will be part of Telenor's prioritized strategic projects and play a role in transformation initiatives, gaining invaluable experience from top management at both divisional and national levels.
   

  

 Our Management Trainee Areas spans from our Network division to Consumer and Finance and below you will find more information of each area. Please read carefully and choose the position that fits your interest and profile. You will challenge and be challenged – are you in? We look forward reading your application! Curious about our Telenor Tech Trainee positions? Read more here!
   

  

*The program runts from August 2025 to August 2026.*
**Network Management Trainee**
 In Networks we want to build leaders of the future and the purpose with this role is to learn about our division and progressing in the role as a future technology manager. We offer you an exclusive insight into management and decision-making processes and the opportunity to build a strong network within the organization. As Network Management Trainee you will be involved in project led by others, with the goal to lead project on your own. You will also learn how to work with technical strategies, financial follow-up and budgeting within a technology organization to build relevant skills for the future.
   

  

**Finance Management Trainee**
 As a Finance Trainee, you will be part of our controller team, gaining hands-on experience in analysis, reporting, and planning. You will rotate across finance functions to understand how a financial organization operates while supporting divisions in tracking strategic plans and identifying early deviations. You will work closely with the CFO and Finance Management team, gaining valuable practical experience in finance processes, decision-making, and steering models. Additionally, you will participate in projects, conduct sensitivity analyses, and evaluate financial processes. Throughout the program, you will build a strong network across finance and other divisions, working closely with key leaders to develop a solid foundation for your future career.
   

  

**CMO Management Trainee**
 Are you ready to kickstart your career? As an CMO Management Trainee, you will shadow and support our CMO in daily operations and strategic projects. You will gain hands-on experience in sales, marketing strategies, digital channels, and service excellence with the aim to drive value and customer growth in line with our strategy. Furthermore, you will
   

  

 collaborate with cross-functional teams, manage projects, and present to senior management.
   

  

**Digital Service Management Trainee**
 As Digital Service Management Trainee, you will get a unique insight in one of Telenor’s transformational projects within Digital Service. You will support Head of Service in managing the Customer Service Transformation Program, including plans, financial effects, and stakeholder coordination. This is an opportunity to get hands-on experience driving projects like process improvements, AI and automation pilots, and business development within digital customer service and learn from experts within both in-house and large outsourcing operations.
   

  

  

  

**Are you the one we’re looking for?** 
  

  

  

  

 We want to strengthen our organization with the next generation of young professionals, and we are looking for you who recently finished, or about to finish your studies.
   

  

 You have a big interest in the world of technology and see the value that telco brings – connecting people to what matters most. We believe that you have a curious mindset with big ambitions and the most important: you dare to challenge, test, fail and pivot.
   

  

 At Telenor we work in an agile environment where you will have the chance to learn and improve every day. You are a true team player with a strong belief that we are better together! You take ownership and deliver with a high level of precision and integrity and value to work in a respectful environment where we see, listen and care for each other.
   

  

 Your profile
   

  

* Maximum one year of work experience (after graduation)
* Degree in Engineering, Management, Finance or equivalent.


 Take this unique opportunity and apply now!
   

  

  

  

**Our promise to you** 
  

  

  

  

**We are better together.**
 Here, you’ll be part of a family-like and inclusive culture, built on strong shared values and leadership that empowers you with both trust and confidence. We believe in enabling each other to act and make decisions, while always having each other’s backs through ups and downs.
   

  

**We support relationships and societies.**
 Telenor plays a vital role in the society, giving your work a greater purpose. Every day, we create value for millions of people and maintain a customer-first approach where human relationships are at the heart of everything we do.
   

  

**We make room for life.**
 Work from home up to two days a week, where your role allows it. The rest of the time, we create magic together at the office. You also get two ‘give-me-a-break’ days per year for extra time off, and our flexible working hours help you balance your time. We also support you through every stage of life with our benefits package.
   

  

**We invite you to a career in motion.**
 Your development is at the center of our culture. We dedicate at least 40 hours per year for you to deepen your expertise, explore new areas, and develop in your role. Through Telenor Academy and other learning initiatives, you’ll have the tools and freedom to advance your career. When you want to broaden your horizons, we are present throughout the Nordics.
   

  

  

  

**Apply today!** 
  

  

  

  

 Will you take the next step in your career with us? We look forward to your application! We review applicants on an ongoing basis, so don’t wait—reach out today.
   

  

 If you have any questions or want to know more, feel free to contact Johanna Lagerholm, johanna.lagerholm@telenor.se. Please note that we cannot accept applications via email.
   

  

  

  

**Good to know** 
  

  

  

  

 As part of Telenor’s policy, we conduct background checks on final candidates for all recruitments.

title: Systemadministratör inom Linux
description:
Vi söker nu en erfaren (senior) systemadministratör inom Linx som kommer att ansvara för kundens systemmiljö; servrar, klienter, lagring. Det kan vara antingen på fysisk maskinvara eller handla om virtuella Data Center. Rollen omfattar installation, konfiguration, underhåll och felsökning av operativsystem, tjänster, program och maskinvara på både servrar och klienter.
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att bygga vidare på sin karriär.
   

  

 Start: omgående
   

  

 Varaktighet: tillsvidare
   

  

 Plats: Kista
   

  

 Anställning: heltid
   

  

 Arbetsspråk: svenska och engelska
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter**
* Installera, Konfigurera och underhåll olika Linux-distributioner som Ubuntu, CentOS, RHEL, Debian som används i Enterprise-område
* Installera, konfigurera, underhålla och felsökning olika systemtjänster som DNS, RADIUS, NTP, DHCP, LDAP, MySQL, MariaDB, PHP, Apache, Nginx, Puppet, Ansible, NAS, SAN, EMC, NMS-system
* Installera, konfigurera och underhåll olika Linuxprogram som behövs i Telecom Enterprise-miljö. Olika ansökan om IMS och Radio som inte är Ericsson Node-baserad.
* Utveckla en infrastruktur för att ge stöd till alla affärskrav och utföra regelbunden felsökning på system för att lösa alla problem
* Planera, föreslå och implementera olika system för automatisering
* Hårdvaruinventering
* Servicelager
* Dokumentera olika system så att det är förståeligt för andra och hålla den dokumentationen uppdaterad
* Tätt samarbete med STS Stockholmsgrupper, som Network Team, IMS Team och Radio Team


**Din profil och kvalifikationer**
* Erfarenhet av Linux-servrar i virtualiserade miljöer
* Erfarenhet av Linux-servrar i Klustermiljöer
* Erfarenhet av Puppet och Ansible
* Stark problemlösning och kommunikationsförmåga
* Erfarenhet av MySQL och / eller MariaDB
* Mycket goda kunskaper inom Shell, Perl och / eller Python skript


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

*Mer om oss*
 Centric är ett IT-företag med 380 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Affärsutvecklare med Fokus på Tjänstedesign
description:
*Är du en tjänstedesigner som vill arbeta mer affärsnära? Eller en affärsutvecklare med en gedigen bakgrund inom tjänstedesign? Då kan du vara den perfekta kandidaten för oss!*
**Om jobbet**
 Vi söker en driven och engagerad Affärsutvecklare med starka förmågor inom tjänstedesign till vårt sammansvetsade team som tillsammans driver initiativ för att stärka LF´s helhetserbjudande tvärs affär. Du kommer att arbeta med att utveckla och implementera nya koncept och erbjudanden som träffar både kund och medarbetare. Du kommer att leda och driva målbildsarbeten som förenar kund- och affärsnytta, och du måste trivas med att jobba hela vägen från tidiga utforskande faser till genomförande- och implementeringsfaser. Avslutningsvis så trivs du med att stötta i en bred repertoar av frågor med många kontaktytor inom exempelvis affär, IT, juridik, marknadsföring, analys etc.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden inkluderar:
   

  

* Delta i projekt och driva initiativ som stödjer gruppens uppdrag - att arbeta tvärs affär.
* Ta fram agerbara insikter kopplade till kund- och medarbetarbehov baserat på kvalitativa och kvantitativa data.
* Utveckla prototyper och koncept på lösningar som förenar användarnytta med affärsnytta.
* Ansvara för användartester och upplägg av pilotstudier.
* Facilitera workshops som syftar till att förena många intressenter kring komplexa och gemensamma lösningar.
* Koordinera, sammanställa och presentera material till olika beslutande forum och grupperingar.


**Vem är du?**
 För att bli framgångsrik i den här rollen ser vi att du har:
   

  

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att ha arbetat som tjänstedesigner eller liknande roll under 4–6 år. Har du även en bakgrund inom andra roller eller yrken, såsom affärsutveckling eller managementkonsult är det meriterande.
* En relevant akademisk bakgrund.
* Hög kompetens inom Design Research och framtagning av agerbara kundinsikter med stöd av såväl kvalitativ som kvantitativ analys.
* Förmåga att driva idégenerering, prototypframställning och konceptualisering.
* Erfarenhet av att testa och iterera på koncept utifrån en mix av olika metoder.
* Stark förmåga och praktisk erfarenhet av att facilitera workshops.
* Starka färdigheter i kommunikation och storytelling, både skriftligt och muntligt.


 Meriterande:
   

  

* God förståelse för teknik, innovation och digitala trender och hur det påverkar kundinteraktioner.
* Hög analytisk förmåga och kapacitet att se den större bilden.
* Strukturerad, pedagogisk och kommunikativ i ditt arbetssätt.
* Förmåga att skapa engagemang, bygga förtroende och relationer.
* Erfarenhet av att hitta vägar framåt i en större komplex organisation med många intressenter.


 Som person är du en pragmatisk och empatisk lagspelare som trivs i samarbete med andra. Du är prestigelös, driven och engagerad, och bidrar med ditt perspektiv samtidigt som du tar till dig av andras. Du är lösningsorienterad, blickar ständigt framåt och inspirerar med din positiva attityd. Du har en förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i komplexa utmaningar och leverera resultat med ditt strategiska och analytiska tänkande. Avslutningsvis har du god förståelse för vikten av ett datadrivet förhållningssätt där kundbehov och affärsnytta förenas med ett starkt fokus på genomförbarhet.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Välkommen till Affärsenhet Sak inom Länsförsäkringar AB. Vi utvecklar sakförsäkringsaffären och driver ny affär. Enheten kompletterar länsförsäkringsbolagens erbjudande med specialprodukter, gemensamma koncept, erbjudanden, kundkommunikation och digital marknadsföring. Vi strävar efter att vara ledande inom sakförsäkring och hanterar personrisk-, motor-, transport-, ansvars- och egendomsförsäkring samt återförsäkringsskydd.
   

  

 Gemensam affärsutveckling tar utgångspunkt i kundens behov och driver initiativ tvärs Länsförsäkringar AB:s affärer för ett stärkt helhetserbjudande och ökad affärsnytta. Vi utvecklar och implementerar nya koncept och erbjudanden, leder plan- och målbildsarbeten och driver möjliggörande utveckling med ett helhetsperspektiv. Vi värdesätter transparens, prestigelöshet och stolthet. Hos oss påverkar du ditt eget arbete genom självledarskap, lärande och utveckling.
   

  

 Tillsammans med ett kompetent gäng bidrar du till att paketera Länsförsäkringar AB:s erbjudanden på ett sätt som möter och överträffar kundernas behov. Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-02-25**

title: Operations Lead
description:
**About Redeploy Run**
 At Redeploy Run, we specialize in platform engineering and operations, helping our customers simplify their infrastructure and speed up application delivery. Our mission is to make cloud adoption faster and easier.
   

  

 Our 'Ready-to-Run' platform products, including Technology Platforms and Industry Cloud Platforms, let IT departments and developers manage infrastructure and governance with ease. Leveraging Infrastructure as Code, container-based services, CI/CD, and Kubernetes, and collaborating with cloud providers like Azure and AWS, we tackle complex problems, enhance our tools, and provide guidance to help mid-sized and enterprise customers get the most of their cloud platforms.
   

  

 As a rapidly growing public cloud company, we understand that our success depends on the talents we choose to surround ourselves with. Now we are looking for a Operations Lead to lead our Operations team to deliver exceptional services and customer success. Maybe it's you?
   

  

**What it means to be a Operations Lead at Redeploy Run**
 As a Operations Lead, you will take lead and ensure the success of our Cloud Operations team and Managed Service offering. This is an important role that combines leadership, customer relationship management, and technical oversight to drive outstanding outcomes for our customers.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities And Tasks Will Include**
* Oversee the delivery of our operations services on Azure, AWS and Kubernetes platforms, ensuring alignment with agreed SLAs and customer expectations.
* People Management responsibility of a team of skilled engineers, providing mentorship, conducting performance reviews, and fostering a collaborative environment.
* Act as the primary contact to build and maintain strong relationships with customers, manage escalations, and ensure their needs are met with excellence.
* Drive continuous improvement and implement strategies to optimize processes, enhance service quality, and achieve operational efficiency.
* Collaborate with customers who often work in agile environments, ensuring smooth integration and delivery in iterative processes.
* Maintain Operational Standards which includes monitoring performance metrics, managing resources, and ensuring adherence to best practices in cloud management, security, and governance.
* Support the sales process targeting both new and existing customers.


**Who are you?**
 We’re looking for someone who thrives in a leadership role, with a strong sense of responsibility and a genuine passion for delivering exceptional results. You should be proactive, solution-oriented, and skilled at building trust—both within your team and with customers. Collaboration is key, so we value a team player who can inspire others and adapt to different working styles. Your ability to stay calm under pressure and handle challenges with a positive attitude will make you a great fit for this role.
   

  

**What experiences do you bring?**
* IT Operations experience, preferably with managing operations on Azure and/or AWS including infrastructure management, incident response and optimizing cloud environments.
* Experience in managing and developing teams, including performance reviews and mentorship.
* Experienced in working directly and with multiple customers, handling escalations, and ensuring satisfaction through clear communication and delivery.
* Knowledge of ITIL principles and experience managing delivery processes in a structured environment.
* Comfortable managing multiple priorities and navigating the complexities of services and customer requirements and expectations.
* Familiarity with agile principles and practices, with the ability to adapt to and collaborate effectively in agile environments.
* Great communication skills, both verbal and written in Swedish and English.


*Even if you don’t perfectly match the role, we still encourage you to apply. We believe in diversity and inclusion and welcome all applicants with relevant experience and skills.*
*🤝* 
**What we offer**
 Being a member of Redeploy means you have the drive and desire to be the best and work smarter than the rest. We enjoy creative freedom with our projects, benefit from great work/life balance, and thrive in a company culture that is both collaborative and supportive. Everything we do at Redeploy is centered around the simple yet effective idea that we all chip in to ensure our success.
   

  

**To Learn More About Our Benefits, Scroll Down 👇🏼**
**📍 Location**
 This role is for our office located in central Stockholm at Torsgatan 4. Because of the nature of this role, we see that you spend most of your working days at the office but do encourage a mix of in-person and remote work to foster innovation and support work-life balance (and like to have fun together).
   

  

 📩
 **How to apply**
 We hope that we have sparked your interest and that you are curious to know more about the role and us at Redeploy.
   

  

 We will consider applications on an ongoing basis so submit your application as soon as you can by hitting the apply button. To be compliant with GDPR, we only accept applications through our careers channel. Please submit your application using the form on our career website, or any website displaying a position with us.
   

  

 For any specific questions about the position, reach out to Talent Acquisition Manager Francisca Andersson.
   

  

 We look forward hearing from you!

title: Group Risk and Internal Controls Manager
description:
**Company Description**
**Who We Are**
 Cint is a pioneer in research technology (ResTech). Our platform enables customers to ask questions and receive answers from real people, empowering them to build business strategies, confidently publish research, and accurately measure the impact of digital advertising. The Cint platform is the world’s largest programmatic marketplace with nearly 300 million respondents across more than 150 countries who consent to share their opinions, motivations, and behaviors.
   

  

 We are feeding the world’s curiosity!
   

  

**Job Description**
**The Opportunity**
 As the Group Risk and Internal Controls Manager you will oversee Risk Management and Internal Control matters across the organisation, ensuring the integrity of financial reporting, mitigating risk, and preventing material fraud.
   

  

 This role requires great technical understanding of regulatory requirements and you will need to be able to translate these into practical plans to set the vision for risk management and the control environment across the business and influence others to deliver in-line with the agreed vision.
   

  

 To succeed in this role, you will need excellent leadership skills, the ability to collaborate across multiple functions, and a deep commitment to educating and driving risk management and internal controls best practices.
   

  

 You will report directly to the SVP Group Finance and working closely with the Global Leadership Team, Audit Committee, CFO and the General Counsel.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Accountable to the Audit Committee for the annual Risk Assessment exercise and Internal Controls self-assessment cycle.
* Working across all relevant group functions including Finance, HR, Legal, IT, Sales, Product, R&D to maintain and continuously improve the robust risk management and internal control framework.
* Lead and advise on the key processes that are in scope for Risk Management review and Internal Controls program and define timetable to stand-up/stand-down any scope changes with supporting detailed documentation of risks and controls.
* Oversee and manage directly the Risk Management and the Internal Controls Programs, including the design and operating effectiveness of controls, including annual self-assessment and review.
* Lead on the remediation of deficiencies identified. This will involve hands-on implementation of new controls, enhancing existing controls and redesigning some processes to mitigate the risk of material misstatement.
* Key leadership role in Corporate Responsibility including further implementation of CSRD reporting.
* Position requiring a deployment of a wide set of skills with ability to deliver RIC programs without direct reports in a cross-functional setting.
* Lead the Risk Management and IC program outwardly into the business, working with stakeholders to influence financial control ownership and responsibility. Establish a cadence and agenda of key control items and steps to resolution with visibility of key topics.
* Represent the Risk management and IC program in the broader Internal Controls Steerco and collaborate effectively with other, functional controls work-streams.
* Develop policies and procedures to mitigate risks and achieve reliable financial reporting and protection of company assets.


**Qualifications**
**What We Are Looking For**
* Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Accounting, or related field
* Certified Public Accountant Qualification
* 7 years Post-Qualification Experience
* Proven experience in board-level reporting and a high standard of verbal and written communication
* Experience of the external/listed environment
* A proven leader with a strong background in financial controls and a track record of improving financial control environments in large organisations


**Bonus Points If You Have**
* Swedish language spoken and written would be an advantage
* Previous experience working for a Swedish listed company


**Additional Information**
**Our Values**
**Collaboration is our superpower**
* We uncover rich perspectives across the world
* Success happens together
* We deliver across borders.


**Innovation is in our blood**
* We’re pioneers in our industry
* Our curiosity is insatiable
* We bring the best ideas to life.


**We Do What We Say**
* We’re accountable for our work and actions
* Excellence comes as standard
* We’re open, honest and kind, always.


**We are caring**
* We learn from each other’s experiences
* Stop and listen; every opinion matters
* We embrace diversity, equity and inclusion.


**More About Cint**
 In June 2021, Cint acquired Berlin-based GapFish – the world’s largest ISO certified online panel community in the DACH region – and in January 2022, completed the acquisition of US-based Lucid – a programmatic research technology platform that provides access to first-party survey data in over 110 countries.
   

  

 Cint Group AB (publ), listed on Nasdaq Stockholm, this growth has made Cint a strong global platform with teams across its many global offices, including Stockholm, London, New York, New Orleans, Singapore, Tokyo and Sydney. (www.cint.com)

title: Agile Coach
description:
**Role: Agile Coach in Computer/IT** 




**Location: Stockholm, Stockholm County, Sweden (Hybrid)** 




  





**Job description**




  





**Knowledge and experience:** 




 •    Agile Coach Tool Support and Jira:
 



 •    Agile Coach with a focus on Confluence and Jira, is responsible for driving the development and implementation of these tools in both projects and line operations.
 



 •    The role includes ensuring effective use of the tools, providing support, training, and structural support to users, collaborating with different departments to customize the tools to their needs, and developing and maintaining documentation and best practices.
 



 •    Experience with agile methods and in-depth knowledge of Confluence and Jira are necessary qualifications.
 



  





**Main duties** 




 •    Collaborate with and support internal stakeholders in agile development.
 



 Set up, lead agile meetings (stand up, big room planning, etc.).
 



 •    Document and structure progress and working methods.
 



 Create conditions for development/management teams and/or the organization to achieve set goals.
 



 •    Support development teams, leaders and managers to work according to the
 



 Customer’s agile methods.
 



 Contributes to managing and further developing the collaboration between business and IT. Leads, trains and coaches managers, leaders and teams in the implementation and further development of the customer's agile development model. Active as a requirement setter for the implementation of Jira.
 



  





  





  





 Requirements
 



 •    Must have the right to work in Sweden
 



 •    You must speak and write Swedish and English.

title: Director, AI Strategy & Partnerships
description:
**Craft:**
 Technology & Development
   

  

**Job Description:**
 King is a leading interactive entertainment company for the mobile world, with people all around the world playing one or more of our games. We have developed more than 200 fun titles and offer games that are enjoyed all around the globe. Our games include global hits like Candy Crush Saga, Candy Crush Soda Saga and Farm Heroes
   

  

**About the Role:** 
 We are looking for a
 **Director of AI Strategy & Partnerships** 
 to oversee and enhance the strategic
 **partnership between King and Microsoft.** 
 This executive role is pivotal in
 **integrating AI technologies from Microsoft** 
 , including collaborations with Xbox and other Microsoft Gaming studios, to drive innovation and growth at King. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in business development and AI technologies, with the ability to bridge technology with business goals.
   

  

 You will collaborate closely with our US-based Microsoft colleagues, playing a pivotal role in driving global initiatives. This position requires
 **regular travel to the US** 
 to foster strong partnerships. Additionally, due to time zone differences, you should be prepared for
 **frequent evening calls** 
 , ensuring effective communication and alignment across borders.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Lead the strategic integration of Microsoft's AI/ML technologies across King's game development lifecycle, from concept creation to live operations.
* Explore potential synergies in areas like game design, content creation, and player engagement.
* Establish and nurture senior-level contacts at Microsoft, fostering a strategic partnership environment.
* Drive the identification and evaluation of new AI technologies that could benefit King's game portfolio, including those relevant to Xbox and Microsoft Gaming studios.
* Translate business objectives into technical opportunities that leverage Microsoft’s strengths, including potential synergies with Xbox and Microsoft Gaming.
* Negotiate and manage contracts and agreements, ensuring they meet the strategic objectives and compliance standards of both organizations.
* Act as the primary point of contact for all partnership-related activities and communications between King and Microsoft.
* Provide leadership and insight into the integration of AI technologies, promoting an AI-first approach within King’s product and service offerings.


**Qualifications:**
* Proven leadership experience in strategic partnerships, business development, or a related field within the tech or gaming industry.
* Strong understanding of AI and machine learning technologies, and how they can be applied in gaming or consumer-oriented digital environments.
* Demonstrated experience managing high-stakes partnerships within complex, multi-stakeholder environments.
* Excellent strategic planning and project management skills, with a track record of driving innovation in fast-paced, evolving landscapes.
* Exceptional negotiation and communication skills, capable of working effectively with both technical teams and executive management.
* Results-oriented, with a record of developing and executing strategies that have materially improved product offerings and company performance.


**Preferred Skills:**
* Experience in business development within AI-driven industries or in roles focused on AI/ML technologies.
* Experience in the gaming industry, particularly in roles that bridge technology and business objectives.
* Advanced degree in Business, Technology, or a related field is preferred.


**Why Join the Kingdom?**
* Be at the forefront of integrating cutting-edge AI and cloud technologies in the gaming industry.
* Lead transformative projects that set new standards in mobile gaming and entertainment.
* Work in a dynamic, inclusive environment that fosters creativity and innovation.
* Collaborate with industry leaders and visionary teams to shape the future of interactive entertainment through groundbreaking AI applications.
* Enjoy a competitive salary, comprehensive benefits, and a forward-thinking company culture.


**About King**
 At King, we're Making the World Playful. Heard of Candy Crush? We're the creators behind it. With game studios in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona and Berlin, and offices in Dublin, San Francisco, New York, and Malta, we have a 20-year history of delivering some of the world's most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry and are on a mission to level-up the little moments for our more than 200 million active monthly users. But we aren't just crushing it with candies, we're also behind Farm Heroes, Bubble Witch, Pet Rescue and loads of other sweet games. As a leading interactive entertainment company for the mobile world, King is part of Activision Blizzard, which was acquired by Microsoft.
   

  

**A Great Saga Needs All Sorts of Heroes**
 King strives to be a place where everyone can be their most authentic self. We recognize that diversity, equity and inclusion is a vital and continuous conversation, and that change only happens when we all come together. It’s our mission to build a diverse and inclusive Kingdom for our people, players, and community.
   

  

**Making the World Playful**
 Making the World Playful is our mission – it’s the thread that connects our people, our players, and our passion for our games. Let’s face it, who doesn’t love a bit of fun?
   

  

 Kingsters are seriously playful: creative thinkers who balance art and science to bring moments of magic to millions daily. But our players aren’t the only ones that can level-up. We’re always looking for ways to champion each other and make what’s already great, even better.
   

  

 So, if this feels like a fun way to spend your days, and you share our passion, our values, and our hunger to shape the future, join us in Making the World Playful.
   

  

 Applications need to be in English.
   

  

 Discover King at careers.king.com

title: Junior Digital Product Owner - OKQ8
job_function: Product Management, Marketing, and Information Technology
description:
*Hela samhället ställer om mot en fossilfri framtid. Vi vill leda utvecklingen i branschen genom att driva förändring och arbetar aktivt för att minska vårt eget klimatavtryck, såväl som att hjälpa våra kunder att göra bättre och mer hållbara val utifrån sina förutsättningar. Vill du vara med och bidra till hållbar utveckling på riktigt? Välkommen att följa med på vår resa!* 




  





 Vill du vara med och driva den digitala utvecklingen i en verksamhet som genomgår stora förändringar på väg mot en mer hållbar framtid? Har du ett brinnande intresse för digital transformation och innovation? Då kan detta vara rätt jobb för dig!
 



  





 Vi söker en nyfiken, proaktiv och utvecklingsorienterad Junior Digital Product Owner. Du blir en del av digitaliseringen hos oss och får ett skandinaviskt ansvar för att utveckla intuitiva och användarvänliga digitala produkter och tjänster i både Sverige och Danmark. OKQ8:s IT- och digitala affärsavdelning genomgår en omfattande transformation för att accelerera utvecklingen, höja kvaliteten på våra digitala lösningar och öka kundeffektiviteten. Här får du möjlighet att påverka framtidens digitala landskap i en organisation med korta beslutsvägar och en inspirerande arbetsmiljö.
 



  





**Din roll** 




 I samarbete med vår Digital Channel Owner kommer du att bidra till planering och koordinering av digitala tjänster och produkter med fokus på webbutveckling och att skapa sömlösa och användarvänliga kundupplevelser.
 



  





 Den avdelning du blir en del av har det övergripande strategiska och operativa ansvaret för att driva utvecklingen av OKQ8:s webbar på den svenska och Q8:s och F24:s webbar på den danska marknaden samt att driva innovation och digitalisering inom detta område. Vi ansvarar även för att utveckla och förbättra digitala tjänster och produkter för våra externa kunder, både privatpersoner och företag.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 



* Säkerställa driften av våra nuvarande webbar med stöd från Channel Owner.
* Planering och genomförande med olika affärsområden av tester vid releaser.
* Koordinering av design, release och utveckling med externa leverantörer.
* Planering och utveckling av effektiva arbetsprocesser och strukturer.
* Dokumentation
* Delta i eller hålla i olika workshops relaterat till utveckling av den nya webben



  





**Vi söker** 




 Vi ser att du har en utbildning inom IT, webb eller digital marknadsföring alternativt erfarenhet av digital utveckling och webbprojekt. Du har en god teknisk förståelse för digital utveckling och förståelse för kundupplevelser i en digital miljö. Du är nyfiken på nya digitala trender och hur de kan tillämpas för att skapa bättre lösningar för våra kunder.
 



  





**Vi ser att du:** 



* Trivs med att arbeta i team.
* Har en analytisk och strukturerad ådra.
* Är proaktiv och initiativrik.
* Har god kommunikativ förmåga och kan samarbeta på alla nivåer.
* Har ett intresse för att utveckla digitala produkter och processer.
* Talar svenska och engelska



  





 Det är en meriterande om du har erfarenhet av några av följande delar även om det viktigaste är att du vill lära dig och utvecklas:
 


* Optimizely eller annat CMS
* Digital projektledning
* Scrum eller andra agila arbetsmetoder
* CX/UX
* Webbanalys (Google Tag Manager/Google Analytics)
* Webb- och systemutveckling



  





 Vi erbjuder en spännande arbetsplats i en avslappnad och inspirerande miljö med högt i tak. Vi tror på personlig utveckling och erbjuder goda möjligheter för detta. Du blir en del av vår skandinaviska avdelning och har din bas på vårt huvudkontor i Stockholm där vi ser att du är ungefär hälften av din arbetstid. Resor inom Skandinavien förekommer.
 



  





 Skicka din ansökan och CV senast den 28 februari 2025. Vi genomför intervjuer löpande och kan komma att stänga annonsen tidigare om vi hittar rätt kandidat.
 



  





 OKQ8 Scandinavia arbetar för att vara en jämställd arbetsplats med medarbetare som trivs och utvecklas och där olikheter uppmuntras. Vi vill vara ett företag som speglar samhället, med en inkluderande kultur som hjälper till att minska utanförskap och bidrar till mångfald.
 



  





 I rekryteringsprocessen ingår både psykometriska tester och kompetensbaserade intervjuer, med syfte att främja en rättvis utvärdering för alla kandidater.
 



  





**Ditt livs kanske viktigaste jobb. På riktigt.** 




 Vi vet att det är en vågad sak att säga, men vi menar verkligen varje ord. Oavsett om det handlar om ditt första jobb, ditt sista jobb, eller om du har modet att anta en ny utmaning, tror vi att du kan få ditt livs kanske viktigaste jobb här hos oss. På riktigt.

title: Solution Architect
description:
**About The Role**
 We are looking for a Solution Architect to join our Business IT function Hydro team which provides end to end support towards our hydro business with dedicated solutions and services. You will be working in a small team collaborating with the larger international IT community and different vendors. Your main focus area as a Solution Architect will be designing, developing and documenting our solutions in the Hydro IT portfolio. The work is focused towards Information technology (IT) and Operational technology (OT) interfaces as well as related site IT infrastructure in combination with data flows to business solutions to support use cases e.g. AI/ML service. At Fortum we have a hybrid working model requiring some office presence. This role is located in Sweden and our main office is in Solna. Some travelling will be required, both domestically and internationally (mainly to Finland).
   

  

 Location:
   

  

  

* This position is located in Stockholm, Sweden.
* The position is hybrid, meaning that days in the office will be required
* Travelling will be required, both domestically and internationally (mainly to Finland)


**What We Are Looking For**
 The role includes a wide variety of tasks, where hands on skills in combination with forward looking solution design are needed in order to succeed in the role. These skills and experiences include:
   

  

  

* Documented experiences, knowledge and relevant work experience minimum of 5 years.
* Strong knowledge of software architecture principles and design patterns.
* Experience with hybrid landscapes i.e. a combination of cloud / on prem infrastructure
* Understanding of infra, data, security and service related impacts of solution design
* High awareness of Cyber security practices and principles
* Experience working with high security and continuity requirements
* Ability to communicate fluently with stakeholders to identify opportunities to solve business challenges
* Passion to improve and optimize WoW, governance, DevOps and service processes
* Experience with Linux and Windows server environments
* Experience with IoT and data communication technologies/standards/protocols (e.g. Kepware, OPC, MQTT)
* Previous exposure to OT system integrations and the related IT Infrastructure
* Fluent in Swedish and English language (written and spoken)


 As a person we believe you are an independent team player with ability to structure, plan, prioritize, as well as drive your own tasks in coordination with the team and business stakeholders. You have very good communication skills with an ability to communicate and understand our business stakeholders. You are customer oriented with interest in understanding needs and expectations in the Fortum organization. You keep attention to details, at the same time being forward thinking with a drive to improve and deliver the best solutions. We believe you have:
   

  

  

* A positive can-do attitude and the ability to work well in a team and collaborate broadly
* experience in finding the optimal solution for each business need taking the overall application architecture into account
* experience of managing (agile) technology development together with business and technology teams
* good understanding of technology capabilities and proactively researching for new solutions
* Security and continuity mindset towards the full life cycle of every solution, application and service
* Focus on long term problem solving with a hands on approach when needed


 We also consider it beneficial if you
   

  

  

* Have a background as a software, solution, integration, data engineer or DBA
* Have Finnish language skills
* Are familiar with ISO62443 and the Purdue model
* Have an understanding of the basics of system administration,
* Have an understanding network architecture,
* Have experience in working in agile teams and DevOps/DevSecOps
* Previous exposure to OT, IoT, connectivity and communication topics
* Have experience with hybrid solutions i.e. onprem in combination with cloud
* Have previous experience with containerization/virtualization
* Have experience from application maintenance and development, preferably in a cloud platform (Azure/AWS) based environment with multiple integrations and complex setup


**We offer you**
 At Fortum, we believe in a better future and want to be involved in shaping it. Our workplace is a safe place, both physically and mentally. You will grow with professional colleagues, being trusted and free to challenge yourself. We offer comprehensive benefits, flexible working hours, and hybrid work model to support your productivity, development and wellbeing. We are committed to build diverse teams where everyone feels included and is treated equally.
   

  

 More information about our culture and benefits can be found here.
   

  

**Interested?**
 Submit your application latest on 5/3/2025. We start contacting suitable candidates already during the application period. If you have questions and would like to hear more about the position, please contact Anna Lilly Brodersson, anna.lilly.brodersson@fortum.com, +46704768131 .
   

  

 Contact details to union representatives can be found on the bottom of
 **this page.**
 To be selected for the position, the applicant must go through background clearance.
   

  

**We are Fortum**
 Fortum is a Nordic energy company. Our purpose is to power a world where people, businesses and nature thrive together. We are one of the cleanest energy producers in Europe and our actions are guided by our ambitious environmental targets. We generate and deliver clean energy reliably and help industries to decarbonise their processes and grow. Our core operations in the Nordics comprise of efficient, CO2-free power generation as well as reliable supply of electricity and district heat to private and business customers. For our :5 000 employees, we commit to be a safe, and inspiring workplace. Fortum's share is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki. fortum.com

title: Service Delivery Director
description:
****Join Telavox as Service Delivery Director 🌎****
 Telavox is looking for a customer Service Delivery Director to oversee critical operator projects, ensuring successful delivery while driving innovation, efficiency, and quality in telecom and cloud communication solutions.
   

  

 In this role, you’ll drive initiatives that streamline project management, refine solution architecture, and optimize service delivery processes for excellent customer outcomes.
   

  

**About The Job**
 As the Service Delivery Director, you will align technical delivery with business objectives. You’ll lead major customer engagements, oversee complex projects, and ensure solutions are designed and delivered to meet the highest standards. In this role, you will also collaborate closely with sales teams, contributing to pre-sales efforts and enabling commercial management to ensure our solutions meet technical and business objectives. While the primary focus is hands-on project management, your efforts will shape a scalable and efficient delivery function, aligning with Telavox’s global ambitions in UCaaS and Telco solutions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead and manage projects by planning and delivering key Operator initiatives, ensuring timely execution within budget and scope.
* Optimize Service Delivery by developing scalable workflows and processes that drive efficient, high-quality customer service delivery.
* Collaborate on solutions by partnering with Solution Architects to design tailored, customer-centric architectures for telecom services.
* Strengthen client relationships by acting as the primary project interface for Operators, managing engagements to meet KPIs, and fostering long-term partnerships.


**About You**
 This role is ideal for a strategic and hands-on leader who thrives in dynamic environments and is motivated by the opportunity to shape scalable delivery functions aligned with Telavox’s global ambitions.
   

  

 We’re looking for an experienced professional with a technical background and an ability to manage complex projects. You thrive at building relationships across technical, operational, and commercial dimensions while driving impactful results.
   

  

**Key Qualifications And Skills**
* With telecom expertise, you bring in-depth knowledge of VoIP, UCaaS, SIP, PBX systems, and cloud-based communication solutions, enabling you to manage modern telecom challenges effectively.
* Your project leadership skills are evident in your track record of successfully managing large-scale projects for Tier 1 Operators, consistently meeting or exceeding delivery KPIs.
* Leveraging your solution architecture expertise, you excel in designing scalable, secure, and reliable telecom solutions that align with customer needs.
* Focusing on customer engagement ensures you have strong experience managing client relationships and delivering exceptional outcomes that exceed expectations.


**We Like You To Have**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business, or a related field.
* Experience in telecom and software project delivery, particularly within the Operator domain.
* A strategic mindset combined with hands-on execution capabilities.


 At Telavox, we foster a culture of innovation and collaboration. Based in our Malmö or Stockholm office, you’ll be part of a fast-growing, inclusive team that values your expertise and contributions. This is your opportunity to make a real impact and advance your career with a company at the forefront of UCaaS and telecom solutions.
   

  

****Why Telavox? 💚****
 Since Telavox's journey started in 2002, we have strengthened our position as the leading forward-thinking communication platform for businesses. We offer Telephony, PBX, messaging, meetings, and contact centres in one simple platform. Unlike our competitors, we own our platform and develop everything ourselves in-house.
   

  

 Today, we are a fast-growing and profitable company with +1.9b in revenue and +500 Telavoxers in nine countries. We pride ourselves on creating an inclusive, supportive culture where everyone can thrive.
   

  

 By joining us, you will not only contribute to our technology but also be part of a company that values work-life balance, continuous learning, and community. Plus, you will enjoy our legendary company events, personal development opportunities, and much more 😀
   

  

**Are you interested in becoming part of Telavox? Apply now!**
 At Telavox, we don't focus on fitting in; we focus on making room for everyone.
   

  

 Join Telavox, where diversity fuels innovation. Apply now to join a team committed to creating a truly inclusive workplace.
   

  

 Do not miss out on this exciting opportunity to grow your career and make your mark on the future of telecom technology. Send your application our way, and let us explore what we can achieve together!
   

  

 For any questions, feel free to reach out to Talent Acquisition Partner Ami Faraguna at ann-marie.faraguna@telavox.com
   

  

**Due to the holiday season, responses to applications may be delayed. Our team will review all applications and get back to you after January 13th. Thank you for your patience, and happy holidays! 🎄**
**Learn more about what we do! ⬇️**
 Telavox develops world-leading communications platforms with solutions for smart and efficient telephony, PBX, chat and much more. Regardless of whether it involves an entrepreneur-driven startup or a giant among giants, Telavox contributes to making companies more transparent, efficient and accessible.

title: Testledare till Axfood IT, Stockholm
description:
Som en av dagligvarubranschens största aktörer gör vi inom Axfood skillnad i miljontals människors liv – varje dag. Tillsammans vill vi skapa mer livskvalitet för alla vi berör genom våra olika koncept, verksamheter och varumärken. Vi tror på ständig förbättring och utveckling, och på att visa omtanke till omvärlden medan vi förändras. Var med på en resa i en spännande bransch där nytänkande, engagemang och prisvärd, bra och hållbar mat är viktiga ingredienser.
   

  

 På Axfood IT stöttar vi hela Axfoodkoncernen med moderna digitala lösningar. Idag är vi ungefär 350 medarbetare som tillsammans hittar nya sätt att utmana. Med modern teknik, kreativ arbetsmiljö och ett aktivt inkluderingsarbete försöker vi skapa de bästa förutsättningarna för varje medarbetare att växa och trivas hos oss.
   

  

**Ditt nya team**
 ”Varuförsörjning” jobbar med hela logistikflödet hos oss på Axfood. Våra ansvarsområden är order, lager, och transport, och innefattar alltså hela logistiken varans resa, från att den beställs av en butik, till våra automatiserade lager, till att den körs ut av våra lastbilar.
   

  

 I teamet jobbar en härlig blandning av produktägare, applikationsspecialister, lösningsarkitekter och systemansvariga. Det är ett socialt team där alla hjälps åt och får utrymme att påverka.
   

  

 I teamet används en stor mängd system, men mycket är baserat på våra SAP system: ECC, EWM, UDF (CAR) och FnR.
   

  

**Ett ax-plock - kollegornas favoriter på jobbet**
* Ett team med högt i tak och stark sammanhållning
* Vi får vara med och påverka miljontals människors vardag med det vi gör varje dag
* Flexibiliteten, här kan vi jobba hemifrån och det finns stor respekt för kollegor som behöver flexa ut tidigare på dagarna.


**Om rollen**
 Som testledare är du spindeln i nätet för testverksamheten inom huvudprocessen Varuförsörjning som ansvarar för logistiksystemen inom Axfood. Allt från större projekt till små utvecklingar inom huvudprocessen samt deltagande i olika forum är din spelplan. Du är med från kravställning till uppföljning av testarbetet. Planera, samordna och leda tester i nära samarbete med våra agila team inom processen är centrala delar i din roll. Externa leverantörer, leveransansvariga och IT ledning är också nära i ditt kontaktnät.
   

  

 Tester sker både manuellt och automatiskt och administreras i relevanta verktyg. Du kommer även arbeta med att ta fram automatiska tester inom regressionstester. Vidare ansvarar du även för att utbilda och informera för att sprida kunskap om testmetodik.
   

  

 Idag sker produktionssättningar löpande samt att vi hanterar två stora releaser per år.
   

  

**Din nya chef har ordet**
 “Är du en driven och framåtlutad person med erfarenhet inom logistik? Vi erbjuder en spännande möjlighet att vara med och utveckla framtidens logistiklösningar.” – Lenny Eriksson, Avdelningschef Varuförsörjning
   

  

**Stämmer detta in på dig?**
 I den här rekryteringen söker vi dig som har lätt att sätta dig in i nya tekniker och system, och som tycker att det är spännande att se de små justeringarnas effekter på hela flödet. Du behöver ha förståelse för systemflöden. Du behöver också ha förståelse för teststrategi och ha förmågan att anpassa dina metoder till projektens förutsättningar. Denna förmåga kan du ha snappat upp om du tidigare jobbat som testledare, men vi är även intresserade av att träffa dig som lärt dig detta på andra vis. Du behöver kunna kommunicera obehindrat på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
   

  

 Vi ser det som meriterande om du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet inom dagligvaruhandel eller likande
* Erfarenhet av något av våra system
* Har tidigare erfarenhet av att jobba agilt och i Jira.


**Ansökningsprocessen**
 Vi vill att det ska vara enkelt att söka jobb hos oss. Om du inte har ett CV redo räcker det med att du länkar en väl ifylld LinkedInprofil. I din ansökan får du svara på de frågor vi behöver svar på i den här delen av processen, och personligt brev är därför inte obligatoriskt.
   

  

 Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan därför tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag 2025-03-13. Vår rekryteringsprocess innehåller tester intervjuer och bakgrundskontroll, och vi kan därför komma att be dig om ditt personnummer. Observera att vi under denna rekryteringsprocess inte kommer be dig logga in med ditt Bank-id eller scanna någon QR-kod.
   

  

 Vid frågor kontakta Medarbetarsupporten på jobb@axfood.se. Läs mer: Så går det till när du söker jobb inom Axfood. Om du har frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Elisabeth Wehlin, elisabeth.wehlin@axfood.se. Av GDPR-skäl behandlar vi inga ansökningar eller annan personlig information via mail.
   

  

 Lyssna på en pod om att jobba på Axfood IT, på Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/37BDOFjcKLkdyleKXLEKXZ?si=UVhPBFC4T96dy-tHa9uuDw

title: Content writer - Freelance AI Tutor (German)
description:
**About The Company**
 Welcome to Mindrift — a space where innovation meets opportunity. We're a pioneering platform dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative online projects. We focus on creating data for Generative AI, offering a unique chance for freelancers to contribute to AI development from anywhere, at any time - without the need to be developers.
   

  

 At Mindrift, we believe in the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI. Our platform allows users to dive into a variety of tasks — ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for better relevance.
   

  

**About The Role**
 If you're a professional who works with text, we have an exciting opportunity to use your writing, editing, technical, and creative skills in a new and innovative way. As an
 **AI Tutor - Writer** 
 , you won't just be writing; you'll be helping to shape the future of AI.
   

  

 We're seeking freelance writers, copywriters, and wordsmiths to collaborate with us in creating a diverse range of content. This role is more than traditional copywriting; it involves training AI systems by crafting text that teaches and informs their responses.
   

  

 As an
 **AI Tutor - Writer** 
 , you will use your writing skills to create text on a wide range of topics. Working with our style guide, you will create responses that will form the ‘voice' for future AI. You will create original, helpful, honest, and harmless text responses and you'll fact check your work using verifiable sources.
   

  

**Requirements**
* You have some professional or educational experience in creative writing, copywriting or editing in German
* Your level of German is proficient (C2)
* Your level of English is upper-intermediate (B2) or above.
* You have a degree in communications, linguistics, literature, journalism, or similar
* You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between projects and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
* Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


**Benefits**
* Take part in part-time, remote, freelance projects that respect your primary professional or academic commitments
* Try your hand at an AI project and enrich your portfolio with new experiences
* Make a tangible impact on the quality of AI

title: Business Controller Product
description:
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

 We are currently looking to recruit two Business Controllers, covering different Products. One role will focus on Voice Products and the other role will focus on Messaging Products.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As Business Controller you will have a significant role within our Product & Tech team. You will play a pivotal role in increasing business insights via improved understanding of data as well as being the finance representative to the Product organization for your area. You will partner with Product Management and Development to provide financial advice and expertise, with high visibility to the senior management team. You will serve as a SPOC to, and collaborate closely with, the Global Finance community to secure a strong delivery.
   

  

 In this role you will play an important part of the team and in shaping the Product Finance function. We have great trust in our team, you will have substantial influence, and we will always value your opinion, knowledge, and expertise. You will have the freedom to challenge current methods, drive ideas and initiatives that may impact on the way we operate on a larger scale. You will join a passionate team that strives for constant improvements in the operational data as well as financial insights and delivery.
   

  

 This role is based at Sinch HQ in Stockholm, Sweden and you will report to the VP Product & Tech Finance.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Partner with Product leaders within the product area to drive achievement of financial and operational targets
* Work as SPOC for finance to the Product organization, in a two way communication method
* Deliver frequent and time sensitive ad hoc analyses including new business cases and new product launches, including pricing and profitability calculations
* Analyze and report on the growth, profitability and returns
* Be responsible for and, together with the product lead, drive the product profitability, measures and performance
* Analyze and monitor key financial trends and critical metrics for internal reporting to support business decisions, understanding key variances and business drivers
* Drive, create and maintain short-term and long-range business plan/budget/forecasts
* Support monthly, quarterly, annual closing and reporting cycle
* Continuously work on improving our processes and daily tasks with the team


**Requirements**
 To be successful in this role you enjoy working in a fast-paced international environment and you thrive in a climate of change. You provide exceptional service and have a strong drive to bring value to your stakeholders. You have excellent business modeling and data analytical skills and deep understanding of business drivers.
   

  

* Proven experience in business controlling, ideally from a Telco company or complex global organization with large datasets
* Experience from working as a finance support function collaborating with business owners. Ideally within a Product function or Commercial.
* In-depth knowledge and understanding of financial reporting and analysis
* Advanced user in Excel
* Experience of ERP systems, BI tools (Tableau), Planning tools (Anaplan) is a plus
* Fluency in English is required


 Our corporate language is English, please submit your application in English.
   

  

**Our recruitment process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
**About Abbott**
*Abbott is a global healthcare company devoted to improving life through the development of products and technologies that span the breadth of healthcare. At Abbott, we're committed to helping you live your best possible life through the power of health. For more than 125 years, we've brought new products and technologies to the world -- in nutrition, diagnostics, medical devices and branded generic pharmaceuticals -- that create more possibilities for more people at all stages of life. Today, 109,000 of us are working to help people live not just longer, but better, in the more than 160 countries we serve.*
*Our mission is to understand that the first step to living your best life is good health. Everything we make is designed to help you do just that. That’s our commitment to building life-changing technologies that keep your heart healthy, nourish your body at every stage of life, help you feel and move better, and bring you information, medicines and breakthroughs to manage your health www.abbott.com*
**EDTS – en del av Abbott**
 European Drug Testing Service (EDTS) AB startade sin verksamhet 1991 inom området slumpvisa drogtester på arbetsplatsen. Idag ingår EDTS i Abbott koncernen och vi är med våra fyra affärsområden ett ledande drogtestföretag i Norden. Förutom genomförande av drogtester på arbetsplatser, bistår vi vårdföretag med administrativa tjänster och digitala lösningar inom drogtestning och laboratorieanalyser.
   

  

 Vi säljer och förmedlar även högkvalitativa produkter för drogtestning, bl.a. screeningstester (POCT) i saliv och urin, instrument för drogtestning, alkometrar samt reagenser.
   

  

 Våra kunder finns bl.a. inom kommun och landsting, arbetsgivare och företagshälsovård, laboratorier, privata vårdgivare samt skolor. Vår företagskultur präglas av kvalitet, trygghet och innovation samt en fortsatt ambition att i nära samarbete med våra samarbetspartners och kunder driva utvecklingen i branschen.
   

  

 EDTS söker nu två personer för ett års vikariat med möjlighet till förlängning.
   

  

 Som
 **Customer Success Manager** 
 ansvarar du för planering, leverans och uppföljning av alkohol- och drogtester till ca 200-300 egna kunder. Du är kundens primära kontaktväg i olika slags ärenden, och du samarbetar även nära våra partners. Våra kunder är vana vid en mycket hög kompetens- och servicenivå och vårt mål är att fortsatt vara den i särklass mest professionella och trygga leverantören inom arbetsplatsdrogtestning.
   

  

**Ansvarsområden**
* planering, leverans samt uppföljning av alkohol- och drogtester för cirka 200-300 kunder
* uppstart och implementing av drogtestprogram hos nya kunder
* primär kontaktperson för tilldelade kunder, vilket innebär att vara den som i första hand kommunicerar med och ger support till kunden
* samordna och genomföra kundaktiviteter som utvecklings- och uppföljningsmöten
* fakturering för tilldelade kunder


 Vi arbetar ständigt med utveckling och effektivisering för att öka kundvärdet så i rollen ingår även deltagande i interna projekt och möten.
   

  

 EDTS eget framtagna administrativa system (EASY) är ett viktigt verktyg i det dagliga arbetet, likaså mail och telefon. Det är också viktigt att kunna uttrycka sig väl både skriftligt och muntligt på svenska och engelska.
   

  

 För att trivas i rollen bör du vara strukturerad och självgående i ditt arbetssätt. Din arbetsdag är omväxlande mellan planerande administrativa uppgifter samt kundorienterade aktiviteter vilket förutsätter att du är flexibel och besitter förmågan att självständigt prioritera inom ditt ansvarsområde.
   

  

 Du analytisk, organiserad, noggrann och lösningsorienterad samt duktig på att bygga och bibehålla goda kundrelationer. Då vi ständigt jobbar med förbättringar är det självklart för oss att du ser utvecklingsmöjligheter i det dagliga arbetet. Vårt arbetsområde är komplext vilket förutsätter ett nära samarbete med båda sälj- och leveransavdelningen. För att passa in i arbetslaget du vara prestigelös samt ha mycket god samarbetsförmåga.
   

  

**Grundläggande Kvalifikationer**
* Erfarenhet av kundnära roller där du med framgång bibehållit en hög servicenivå (kundansvar/projektledning/kundsupport)
* Mycket goda kunskaper i Officepaketet
* Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift
* God digital vana och förmåga att enkelt och snabbt navigera mellan flera IT-system, meriterande är Salesforce och SAP


**Meriter**
* Erfarenhet av liknande bransch t.ex. inom företagshälsovård, laboratorieverksamhet eller liknande är meriterande
* Tidigare erfarenhet av kundansvar eller kundsupport
* Kandidatexamen från lämpligt studieområde


**Skicka din ansökan genom att ladda upp CV och personligt brev.**
**OBS! Ansökningar utan ovanstående kommer inte att beaktas!**
 Besök gärna vår hemsida för mer information EDTS: https://www.toxicology.abbott/se/sv/index.html

title: Facility Manager to Arenastaden | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Are you passionate about property services and attracted by the opportunity to help manage SEB's largest office building? Do you work with similar tasks today and are driven by delivering a world-class property solution, both today and in the future? Then we have the job for you! SEB is now looking for a new Facility Manager for the office in Arenastaden.
   

  

 Read more about Arenastaden
 **here** 
 !
   

  

**About the role:**
 As a Facility Manager, you will be part of a team dedicated to aligning operations with SEB’s business needs. Reporting to the Head of Facilities Management Arenastaden, you will work alongside six colleagues responsible for delivering top-tier services in collaboration with our external partners. The team oversees key projects within the property, such as renovations and internal relocations, while also ensuring compliance with SEB’s physical security policies.
   

  

 This is a dynamic and multifaceted role that involves proactive requirement-setting with partners and close collaboration with internal stakeholders to deliver world-class service. Key focus areas include digitalization, evolving ways of working, environmental initiatives, and heightened security demands.
   

  

 Arenastaden is one of four organizational pillars within Group Real Estate (GRE), SEB’s global corporate real estate function. As part of this organization, you will be connected to around 100 colleagues with diverse expertise, all working toward the goal of providing sustainable, attractive, flexible, and efficient workplace solutions—both now and for the future.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 If you've made it this far, you likely see both the appeal of this role and the scale of its challenges.
   

  

* You might currently be working as a Facility Manager, Property Manager, or perhaps a multitasking Hotel Director.
* You have a proven track record of delivering exceptional service and driving successful change initiatives.
* Your personal qualities matter greatly - we value dedication, customer focus, a hands-on approach, and the ability to prioritize and stay organized.
* To thrive in this role, you need a true passion for world-class service and the ability to demonstrate it in everything you do.
* We are also looking for candidates with documented experience in developing and implementing customized working methods or projects.


 A university degree in Facility Management, properties, or equivalent is meritorious.
   

  

**What we offer:**
* Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment
* Hybrid work model, meaning remote work is possible up to 2 days/week
* International opportunities and working environment
* Attractive compensation and access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than
 **March 2nd, 2025.** 
 If you have questions about the position, please contact Jaana Olsson Zeff, Head of Facilities Management Arenastaden, but we will not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Sopra Sterias Accelerateprogram 2025
description:
Om rollen
   

  

**Sopra Sterias Accelerateprogram 2025**
 Genom vårt traineeprogram Accelerate, som blivit utsett till Sveriges bästa inom IT av Karriärföretagen, rivstartar du din karriär som konsult inom digital transformation.
   

  

 Sopra Steria Accelerate ger dig med höga ambitioner en strukturerad utvecklingsplan för dina första tre år i konsultyrket. Vi vet att den största utvecklingen som konsult sker genom att jobba i riktiga kunduppdrag och att få lära sig i skarpt läge. Därför är du konsult från start och kommer till största delen att bygga din kompetens genom att jobba i uppdrag hos någon av våra kunder.
   

  

 Parallellt med ditt uppdrag erbjuder vi dig utbildning som stärker din kompetens och ger dig relevanta verktyg inom flera olika verksamhetsområden. Alla utbildningar är skräddarsydda för att du ska utvecklas i konsultrollen och träna tillsammans med kollegor i en trygg miljö. Exempel på utbildningar inom programmet är Explore Team Delivery och Develop your Innovation Skills. Inom programmet ges du möjlighet att bygga ett brett nätverk både genom arbete i projekt och uppdrag med kollegor inom Sopra Steria.
   

  

 Hos oss blir du anställd från dag ett och får en marknadsmässig lön. Vi erbjuder helt enkelt ett inspirerande och utvecklande program för dig som är nyutexaminerad och vill ha en framgångsrik karriär som konsult. Vårt mål är att du ska lyckas och utveckla dig till att bli en av marknadens vassaste konsulter.
   

  

**Vi Erbjuder Följande Inriktningar 2025**
* Advisory (Stockholm, Göteborg)
* Data & Analytics (Stockholm)
* Digital Platform Services (Stockholm)
* Microsoft Business Applications CRM (Stockholm, Göteborg)
* Systemutveckling (Stockholm, Östersund, Göteborg)


 Här kan du läsa mer om programmet och se mer information kring inriktningarna:
 **Inriktningar traineeprogram Accelerate (soprasteria.se)**
**Vi Söker Dig Som**
* Är på väg att avsluta dina studier eller är nyutexaminerad på kandidat- eller masternivå från universitet eller högskola (examen 2024 eller 2025).
* Har läst en ingenjörsutbildning eller annan relevant teknisk utbildning inom data/systemvetenskap, IT eller liknande.
* Har goda kunskaper i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska.
* Är både en bra lyssnare och en god kommunikatör vilket gör att du kan se nya möjligheter i ditt uppdrag. En av de saker som symboliserar en framgångsrik konsult är högt affärsmannaskap. Ute i ditt uppdrag är du en relationsbyggare för Sopra Steria och kunden.
* Är ambitiös och målinriktad och kan visa att du klarar att förverkliga det du har bestämt dig för att göra, både genom studier och på fritiden. Vi ser gärna att du har visat driv och nyfikenhet genom att engagera dig i olika aktiviteter vid sidan om dina studier.
* Framför allt, brinner du för att jobba med digitalisering!


**Ansökan**
 Vi arbetar med löpande urval i denna process, så ansök redan idag genom att ladda upp ditt CV samt betyg eller examensbevis från din utbildning. Betyg eller examensbevis ska bifogas under “övriga bilagor” i ansökan. Skicka inte med ett personligt brev. Om du är intresserad av Accelerateprogrammet men osäker på vilken inriktning du ska välja, hjälper vi dig att hitta rätt under rekryteringsprocessen. Vi förväntar oss dock att du har läst på om de olika inriktningarna som är öppna i år innan intervjun och har en uppfattning om vilka områden som intresserar dig mest. Om du går vidare i rekryteringsprocessen kommer du att få ett utskick med logik- och personlighetstest, vilka är obligatoriska i vår rekryteringsprocess.
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-03-31
   

  

 Sopra Steria har kunder och projekt som kan kräva säkerhetsgodkännande på olika nivåer.
   

  

 Ytterligare information
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

description:
