title: Mid-Market Account Executive (DACH - Remote Europe)
description:
n8n is a workflow automation platform that uniquely combines AI capabilities with business process automation. We give technical teams the flexibility of code with the speed of no-code, backed by a passionate community of builders. With 400+ integrations and fair-code principles, we're revolutionizing how businesses connect their systems and processes.
  

  

We were founded end of 2019 and currently:


* We’re a diverse team of + 70 talented people
* Our annual recurring revenue is growing 3x year-over-year
* ️ With +58k GitHub stars, we are in the top 0.0001% most popular projects on Github
* We’re Europe’s 25th fastest growing startup in 2024 according to Sifted
* We now count a total of $20m in funding: we were Sequoia's first seed investment in Germany, and most recently secured a Series A extension (February 2024)


We are looking for a driven Account Executive with a strong entrepreneurial mindset to reinforce our team of 6 AEs (3 mid-market) selling our Enterprise plans [https://n8n.io/pricing/?selfHosted=true]. You will be reporting in the first couple months directly to Ben, our VP Sales, then to a Senior Sales Manager.

* **SALES CYCLE:** You’ll own the full sales cycle (2-5 months average) from opportunity detection to drafting compelling offers.
* **INBOUND (70-80%):** You drive and optimize the pipeline of inbound, product-qualified leads for n8n's self-hosted Enterprise plans (Company size: under 500 employees | Deal size: 20-30K ARR).
* **OUTBOUND (20-30%):** You relentlessly test out innovative outbound strategies to build a sustainable leads pipeline.
* **STRATEGIC RELATIONSHIPS:** You develop and cultivate relationships with key decision-makers, particularly team leaders in DevOps, engineering, and IT. Be the trusted advisor our clients turn to for workflow automation solutions.
* **SALES EFFICIENCY:** Be proactive in developing and improving sales processes, infrastructure and collateral.
* **PRODUCT IMPROVEMENT:** Work closely with our product team, ensuring a seamless flow of customer feedback.

**Key success factors:**

* Around 800 inbound leads per month
* Support from solution consultants and the product team
* Strong community: around 50% inbound leads are already product qualified

**Requirements**
----------------

* 4+ years of sales experience at a BtoB SaaS company
* **Mid-Market experience:** You’re used to closing 4 figure deals
* **High quota:** You've held a +600K ARR quota in your current / previous roles
* **Top performer:** You have a track record of being in the top 10% of your sales team
* **Highly tech-savvy:** You’ve sold to highly technical stakeholders (IT operations, devops, secops, software engineers) and/or know how to code and/or have an engineering background.
* **Entrepreneurial mindset:** You spot opportunities for growth, suggest a plan to address them, and execute it. You’re able to work independently without a ton of established structure or processes.
* **Hunter mindset:** You have a proven track record in outbound sales.
* **Bonus points:** You have experience with open source, developer tools, PLG companies and/or startups at Series A-C stage. You have sold to cybersecurity teams and leaders.
* **Language:** German and English fluent (the company language is English, do not send a German CV!)
* **Location:** Based in Europe.

*n8n is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.*

*We can sponsor visas to Germany; for any other country, you need to have existing right to work.*

***Our company language is English.***

*You care about diversity and inclusion? We do too! Check out our* *Diversity, Inclusion and Belonging initiatives at n8n* *(**https://www.notion.so/n8n/Diversity-inclusion-and-belonging-n8n-c1bec2fff536422d868b1a438d990e35**).*

***Location disclaimer:*** *If you see multiple job postings for the same role, it is most likely because we're hiring remotely for this role and posting in different locations to make sure every potential candidate can see the role. Please apply to the location you're the most likely to work from in the future.*

**Benefits**
------------


**Competitive compensation**  

**Ownership:** Our core value is to “empower others”, and we give you a slice of n8n in the form of equity.  

**Work/life balance:** We work hard, but make sure everyone can properly recharge their batteries with 30 days holiday, plus public holidays wherever you are.  

**Career growth:** We are looking to hire 'rising stars', who can grow with the company into more senior roles. We give you €1k a year to spend on courses, books, events and coaching, to support you in developing your career.  

**A passionate team:** We love our product, and we have regular office hackathons to see who can build the coolest thing with it!  

**Remote-first:** Unless specified otherwise on the job posting, our team works remote from anywhere within Europe but we have regular off-sites to help build team bonds and alignment.  

**Transparency:** We all know what everyone’s working on, how’s the company doing — the whole shebang.  

 **Giving back:** We're big fans of open source, and you'll get $100 per month to support projects you care about.  

 **Ambitious but kind culture** where people love to work - our eNPS for 2023 is 100!

title: Learning & Development Specialist
description:
**Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a**  

  

**Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our**

**About VIPAS :**


Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.

**Job Description:**


We are seeking a dedicated and experienced Learning & Development Specialist to join our team, focusing on commercial training. The ideal candidate will lead assignments, develop and implement learning activities within Sales, Marketing, and Commercial Operations. This role requires excellent communication skills, strong planning capabilities, and a passion for continuous improvement.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Lead and manage training assignments, including setting scope, developing content, and implementing learning activities.


* Conduct training in various settings (onsite, hybrid, offsite), with the primary location being the Södertälje office for 1-2 days per week, with potential for more depending on assignments.


* Collaborate with internal stakeholders to ensure training programs meet organizational needs and quality standards.


* Utilize data analytics to assess the effectiveness of training programs and identify areas for improvement.


* Stay updated with the latest trends in digital training methods and integrate them into the training programs.


* Maintain comprehensive technical documentation and records of training activities.


* Foster a collaborative and supportive environment within the training team.

  

**Requirements:**

* University degree, with a strong emphasis on andragogic knowledge and experience in competence development activities such as e-learnings and physical instructor-led training.


* Proven experience in leading training assignments and developing effective learning activities.


* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to engage with internal stakeholders.


* Excellent planning and follow-up skills, with the ability to handle changes and work collaboratively within a large team.


* Proficiency in English is required, as all conversations within the multicultural team are conducted in English.


* Experience in data analytics and the ability to learn new programs quickly.


* Knowledge of the automotive industry or previous work with customers is a plus.


* Preference for digital training methods and innovative approaches to learning.

  

**Why Join Us?**



Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.


You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!


Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at kumud@vipas.se


Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.

 **How to Apply:**


Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!

  

Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested, we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Devops Engineer
description:
**Prorenata expanderar och söker en DevOps Engineer!**

Är du en naturlig problemlösare som förstår hela leveransprocessen? Drivs du av utmaningar och vill vara den sammanhållande länken mellan process och teknik? Då kan detta vara rollen för dig!


Prorenata utvecklar användbara, enkla och effektiva verktyg för sina användare, som annars ofta är hänvisade till svåranvända och föråldrade system. Företaget är ett lönsamt och snabbväxande mjukvarubolag med kontor i centrala Stockholm. Deras produkt är ett journalsystem för elevhälsa, som idag används av kommuner motsvarande över halva Sveriges befolkning.


**Om Prorenata**

Bolaget startade 2010 och har vuxit organiskt med en årlig tillväxttakt på cirka 25 %. Vi är helt kundfinansierade och låter våra kunders behov styra vårt arbete.


*"Vi* vill inte ta över världen – vi vill bara skapa enkla men kraftfulla verktyg för våra användare, och det är vi riktigt bra på!"


Prorenata är främst ett familjeägt företag med cirka 50 anställda. Företaget strävar efter att driva en framgångsrik verksamhet samtidigt som kunderna ska uppleva Prorenata som en pålitlig partner. Dessutom lägger företaget stor vikt vid att medarbetarna trivs, utvecklas och mår bra på jobbet.  

  



**Rollen som DevOps Engineer**

Som DevOps Engineer på Prorenata blir du en central länk mellan process, teknik och kund. Rollen innebär ett helhetsperspektiv på leveransprocessen – från utveckling till driftsättning – med fokus på att säkerställa kvalitet och effektivitet.


Prorenatas DevOps-team består av 2–4 personer, och i denna roll ligger huvudansvaret på att kontinuerligt upprätthålla och optimera företagets system. Rollen är främst operativ snarare än utvecklingsinriktad, vilket innebär nära samarbete och stöd från företagets Backend-utvecklare.


**Den här rollen har ett särskilt fokus på:**

* Serverhantering i olika former, inklusive Kubernetes, MySQL, OpenStack, Grafana och loggning.
* Drift och underhåll av databaser, inklusive server-side database administration (DBA).

**Vi söker dig som:**

* Har erfarenhet av drift och underhåll av IT-system.
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta med server-side database administration (DBA).
* Är lösningsorienterad och van vid att agera ad hoc vid oväntade händelser.
* Har en hög grad av självledarskap och trivs med att ta eget ansvar.
* Är kommunikativ och kan hantera tekniska frågor på ett tydligt och pedagogiskt sätt.
* Trivs med förändring och utmaningar.
* Behärskar både svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.

**Tekniker och verktyg Prorenata använder:**

* Kubernetes
* MySQL
* OpenStack
* Grafana
* Loggning och övervakning av IT-system
* Python
* GitHub (mindre fokus på CI/CD, men grundläggande kunskap är meriterande)


Vi ser gärna att du har tidigare erfarenhet av några av ovanstående teknologier – särskilt Kubernetes, MySQL och drift av IT-system.


**Prorenata** **erbjuder:**


* En arbetsplats med stor möjlighet till kompetensutveckling och personlig utveckling.
* Ett roligt och inspirerande team som stöttar varandra.
* En flexibel arbetsmiljö med fokus på innovation och kvalitet.
* Möjlighet att jobba med en produkt som gör skillnad för användarna.
* Hybrid arbetsmodell som kombinerar arbete på kontoret och hemifrån

**Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din utveckling?**


Ansök idag och bli en del av Prorenatas Team!


Om du har några frågor, tveka inte att höra av dig till rekryteringsansvarig:


Emelie Sjöstrand 0707528906

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
**Cloud Engineer | Stockholm | Modern Tech Consultancy** 




  





 My client, a fast growing Boutique consultancy, based in the heart of Stockholm to scale their business massively over the next year.
 



  





***What sets them apart?***




 This customer is an employee-driven-company they strive to make their business decisions around the betterment of their employees careers. This is why, very early on they decided to only pursue projects that utilise very modern tech stacks not only to capitalise on the ever-growing industry and it's innovations but also to ensure their employees are constantly working towards becoming the best Developers and versions of themselves that they can be.
 



  





**Desired Profile:** 



* Between 2-8 years of professional experience in Cloud Computing (AWS/Azure/GCP).
* Based in Stockholm or a commutable surrounding area.
* Any experience with skills like Terraform, Kubernetes, Kibana , (Azure) DevOps etc is advantageous.
* Fluent English & Swedish speaking.
 *Candidates with limited but progressively improving Swedish speaking capabilities will still be considered, should they be exceptional on all other fronts.*
* Any experience with leadership, mentorship or exp being a Scrum Master will be interesting and advantageous.



  





**What's on offer?:** 



* Extensive training opportunities in modern tech stacks and domains, including a monthly get-together for a day of knowledge sharing and upskilling (during working hours).
* Here you will find an environment of likeminded, passionate, peers and leaders, dedicated to the success and development of one another. Corporate workflows and environments are not prevalent. You will feel your value from Day 1.
* Paying up to 70 000 SEK / Month.
* Annual business trips.
* Consultants are deployed in teams so look forward to working with and upskilling with your colleagues whilst gaining valuable network connections on project.



  





 Sound of interest? Please apply with your up to date CV or email me at TMU@Thor-Companies.com

title: Cloud Architect
description:
*Do you want to play a key role in shaping our cloud journey and strengthening our application architecture? We are now looking for a Cloud Architect to join us and take the next step on our transformation journey toward the Cloud.*
**About The Job**
 As a Cloud Architect with focus on application architecture, you will lead architectural work within our engineering domain. You will play a central role in shaping strategies and plans, as well as leading operational architectural work. Working closely with our platform and product teams, you will build a deep understanding of our workflows and promote collaboration, contributing to smooth and efficient deliveries. Together with the team, you will ensure that the architecture supports security, availability, scalability, performance, and innovation.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* Developing and evolving our application architecture to align with the company’s roadmap.
* Collaborating with teams across the organization to understand needs and ensure the architecture supports them.
* Ensuring that technical decisions and architectural patterns follow best practices and industry standards.
* Staying up to date on the latest cloud technologies and sharing knowledge within the organization.
* Working hands-on with our Cloud team to build our cloud foundation, including cloud-native applications and infrastructure-as-code.


 You will be part of our Cloud team with four colleagues. Together, you’re responsible for our transformation journey toward the Cloud by designing and implementing scalable, cost-effective, and secure cloud applications.
   

  

**Who We Are Looking For**
 To thrive as a Cloud Architect, you enjoy discussing technology and have a knack for bringing others along in change initiatives. You are analytical, solution-oriented, and have strong communication skills, enabling you to explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical colleagues. To succeed in this role, you need to be diplomatic, have a big-picture mindset, and navigate the organization toward solutions that move us forward.
   

  

**We Believe You Have**
* Proven experience as a Cloud Architect or in a similar role, with a focus on application architecture.
* Experience with at least one major cloud platform (GCP, AWS or Azure)
* Knowledge and understanding of modern technologies, architectural patterns, and cloud-native concepts, including microservices, containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes), and serverless architectures.
* Good experience with Java and Terraform, using these technologies for application development and infrastructure-as-code.
* Cloud certifications (e.g. Google Professional Cloud Architect, AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect) are a plus.
* Experience in Fintech is a plus.
* Fluency in Swedish is required.


 To succeed in this role, you should be skilled at driving change effectively, possess strong self-leadership, and have the ability to understand business needs and how they impact architecture. You are down-to-earth, inspiring, and committed to meeting deadlines, with the ability to prioritize and deliver high-quality results in your work.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 We hope that we have sparked your interest and that you are curious to know more about the role and us at Avanza. Apply by clicking the “Apply Now” button below. We review applications continuously, so don’t wait too long to submit yours, but no later than March 9, 2025. To be compliant with GDPR, we only accept applications through our careers channel.
   

  

 If you have any questions, feel free to contact Erik Wikner, Engineering Manager, at erik.wikner@avanza.se.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

*Offers from recruitment agencies/sales advertisers are kindly declined.*

title: SRE - Freelance Security & Automation Engineer (Pentesting Focus)
description:
**About The Company**
 At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.
   

  

 Our goal? Advance the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative Generative AI projects with domain experts. The Mindrift platform allows experts to dive into a variety of tasks ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for better relevance.
   

  

 You'll have the unique opportunity to contribute to AI development anywhere, at anytime. Flexible, community-focused, and innovative—without the need for developer skills.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Generative AI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills.
   

  

 In this role, you will use your skills to train AI systems to identify and exploit security weaknesses in a controlled and ethical manner.
   

  

 Your role will involve designing and executing a code injection attack to identify vulnerabilities in an AI-powered computer agent. You'll receive an onboarding session and sample documentation to guide you through the process. In practice, this means working with Docker containers, writing Bash and Python scripts, modifying HTML files, crafting malicious Linux commands, etc..
   

  

**Requirements**
**Required Qualifications:**
* Strong Linux administration and automation skills (Bash, Python, PowerShell)
* Hands-on experience with penetration testing tools (Metasploit, Burp Suite, Nessus, Nmap)
* Knowledge of AI security risks, including prompt injection, adversarial attacks, and AI red teaming
* Experience in automating security tasks, securing DevOps workflows, and integrating security into CI/CD pipelines
* Cloud security expertise (AWS, Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD security)
* Relevant security certifications (OSCP, CEH, CISSP, OSWE, API Security Architect)
* Proficiency in English: advanced (C1) or above
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
* Strong communication skills for reporting findings and collaborating with teams
* Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


**Preferred Skills:**
* Experience in AI red teaming, adversarial ML, LLM security testing
* Deep understanding of networking protocols, OS security, and web application security
* Knowledge of OWASP Top Ten, MITRE ATT&CK, and other security frameworks
* Experience with web security (HTTP, API security, web scraping, DOM manipulation)


**Benefits**
* Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that works with your schedule and commitments
* Be part of an exciting AI project
* Enrich your portfolio with new experience
* Make a tangible impact on the quality of AI

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Är du en erfaren DevOps-ingenjör med intresse för teknik och att ständigt utvecklas? Vill du hjälpa våra kunder att göra världen lite bättre? Då kan du vara den vi söker.
   

  

 HiQ är utan tvekan ett av Sveriges mest tekniktunga och spännande konsultbolag med kunder inom en rad olika branscher såsom exempelvis fordon, fintech, myndigheter, medtech och telekom. Förutom att vi bidragit till utvecklingen av att snart bli ett kontantlöst samhälle, utvecklar vi även allt från digitaliseringen av elkraftsystem till framtidens autonoma fordon. Enkelt sagt, vi gillar att skapa sådant som förenklar och gör vardagen lite roligare för oss alla.
   

  

 Rollen som DevOps-ingenjör hos oss är en omväxlande roll, med arbete på olika nivåer, där du får en chans att delta i våra kunders DevOps-resa utifrån deras mognadsgrad.
   

  

**Matchar vi?**
 Vi söker dig som blir uttråkad av att göra samma sak två gånger och genast börjar hacka ihop en automatiserad lösning istället. Vi ser gärna att du har automatiserat något som absolut inte behövdes automatiseras! Kanske hemma?
   

  

 De som jobbar med DevOps på HiQ har ofta en kodtung utbildning och har jobbat som DevOps engineer i några år. Vi ser gärna att du har en liknande bakgrund, då vi oftast tar oss an Stockholms mer avancerade uppdrag.
   

  

**Checklist**
* Högskole-/Universitetsexamen inom datateknik, datavetenskap, systemvetenskap eller annan relevant inriktning
* Minst 3 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet
* Flytande i svenska och engelska


 Det är ett stort plus om du har tidigare erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Scripting
* Säkerhet
* Monitorering
* CI/CD-tekniker
* Containeriseringsverktyg och molnlösningar
* Automation i produktionsmiljö med många noder
* IP-nätverk, VPN, DNS, lastbalanserare och brandväggar
* Seamless/automatiserade byggscript för release management i olika miljöer


 Vi ser också gärna att du tidigare byggt sofistikerad infrastruktur med en hög grad av automation och är en förespråkare av infrastructure-as-code.

title: DevOps Cloud Engineer
description:
Who We Are Looking For
   

  

 We are looking for a DevOps Cloud Engineer with 5 years of experience in infrastructure engineering, cloud environments, and possessing high technical skills along with an 'automation first' mindset. You are someone who is proactive with a strong sense of ownership and responsibility, eager to learn, and keen to share knowledge. Experience with building continuous integration and deployment pipelines on cloud platforms is required, along with excellent communication skills.
   

  

 What is Dev-IT
   

  

 You will be working in a small (but growing) team that is providing infrastructure and services to almost every part of the business. Be it from smaller automations to big implementations or development.
   

  

 What you will do
   

  

  

* Build automations for creating new services and integrations for many departments within the company.
* Play an important part of the team, managing the infrastructure of AWS.
* Manage and develop our containers, instances as well as serverless environments.


 Your profile
   

  

**Required Experience**
* Advanced knowledge and hands-on experience with AWS (other public clouds such as Azure and GCP are a plus)
* Experience in working with container technology (ECS, EKS / Kubernetes).
* Advanced experience within scripting languages such as Python, Bash and PowerShell.
* Managed and configured pipelines within Continuous Integration Solutions Azure DevOps / Jira.
* Administrated version control systems like Git, GitHub.
* Experience with Infrastructure as Code tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation and Ansible.
* Identity management and SSO integrations, OAuth, SAML.


**Nice To Have Qualifications**
* Windows and/or Linux sysop background
* ETL knowledge
* Grafana
* VMWare (or similar solutions)


**Our Culture**
 Culture at RaySeach is the driving force behind our organization
 **, where** 
 everything we do is driven by a shared passion for innovation and the fight against cancer. Our dedication is reflected in our ability
 **to deliver** 
 exceptional results,
 **pay** 
 close attention to detail, and consistently
 **go** 
 the extra mile. Our employees stand out as experts in
 **their** 
 field
 **, driven by** 
 a relentless focus on solving problems
 **-** 
 no matter how complex. At RaySearch, we take pride in
 **leading the way in** 
 cancer treatment, leveraging cutting-edge technology to develop innovative
 **solutions** 
 that make a real difference in patient care.
   

  

**Our Offer**
 At RaySearch, we offer a diverse and inclusive work environment, fostering openness, sincerity, and collaboration. Located in Hagastaden, Stockholm's Life Science Hub, our modern and creative workspace includes an in-house gym, yoga, and social activities like ping pong, table football, and regular after-work events. Our bistro serves a fantastic lunch buffet, and we offer morning- and afternoon-fika every day. Our rooftop terrace also provides a stunning 360-degree view of Stockholm, enhancing the work experience. All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package.
   

  

 Application
   

  

 Please apply to the position through the application form below. Selection and interviews will be ongoing. We do not accept applications by e-mail.

title: Platform Engineer
description:
**We’re looking for an ambitious Platform Engineer to join our team.** 




  





 Are you inspired to build scalable systems that accelerate breakthrough technologies? ✨
 



  





 We are a fast-growing Stockholm-based startup with a team of 6, working on a cutting-edge creative product with AI at its core. We believe machine learning and AI are about to redefine what it means to be a creative, who can be part of a creative process and that creativity and AI are a uniquely powerful combination and an incredibly exciting field work in. We pride ourselves on our ability to rapidly adopt new developments, stay curious, and adapt quickly to changing circumstances.
 



  





**In this role you will** 



* Architect, develop, and maintain a scalable, secure, and high-performance platform.
* Improve the platform’s developer experience to empower product engineers to build more sophisticated features faster.
* Embody a culture of engineering excellence with high code quality standards.
* Set up infrastructure for deploying state of the art machine learning models to high performance GPU environments.
* Implement and maintain robust security practices to protect our platform and user privacy.
* Refine monitoring systems to track service performance, uptime, and key metrics.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers and engineers, to help shape the direction of our product.



  





**In your first** 




 Week
 


* Set up your local environment and make a small quality of life improvement along the way.
* Get familiar with the product, make some art!
* Ship at least a bug fix and/or a small feature to production.



 3 months
 


* Make significant improvements to our backend infrastructure.
* Ship numerous end-user facing features.
* Make testing and deploying new machine learning models faster and at lower cost.
* Make a serious dent on our technical debt, be it key technology choices or broken windows.



 6 months
 


* Become the go-to expert for all platform development.
* Continuously improve the platform while aligning with the product goals.
* Elevate our coding practices by mentoring peers and setting high standards for code quality and reviews.
* Maintain a robust monitoring system and security protocols including an on-call rota.



  





**You'll be a great fit if** 




 Requirements
 


* 5+ years of experience working as a backend/full-stack engineer in fast-paced environments.
* Strongly proficient in TypeScript and open to Python and Rust when appropriate.
* Hands-on experience with deploying to cloud platforms and architecting scalable services.
* Familiarity with infrastructure-as-code tools (Terraform, Pulumi).
* Strong programming skills and a proven ability to write efficient and maintainable code.
* Excellent problem-solving, critical thinking, and communication skills.



 Nice to have
 


* Strong interest in creative applications of AI.
* Familiarity with GPU-accelerated computing environments.



  





**What we offer** 



* A challenging and fulfilling opportunity to contribute to the development of a groundbreaking creative product.
* A supportive, collaborative, and innovative work environment with a team of like-minded individuals.
* An opportunity to join an early-stage company and influence how we build the company before there are too many processes and structures in place.
* Competitive salary and an attractive equity program in a start-up funded by top investors Creandum (1st investor Spotify, iZettle, depop) and EQT Ventures (Einride, Sonantic). 🦄
* A learning environment, with interesting challenges to solve and an ambitious team to support you.
* Office located in the heart of Stockholm.

title: Freelance AI Security Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.
   

  

 Our goal? Advance the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative Generative AI projects with domain experts. The Mindrift platform allows experts to dive into a variety of tasks ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for better relevance.
   

  

 You'll have the unique opportunity to contribute to AI development anywhere, at anytime. Flexible, community-focused, and innovative—without the need for developer skills.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Generative AI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills.
   

  

 In this role, you will use your skills to train AI systems to identify and exploit security weaknesses in a controlled and ethical manner.
   

  

 Your role will involve designing and executing a code injection attack to identify vulnerabilities in an AI-powered computer agent. You'll receive an onboarding session and sample documentation to guide you through the process. In practice, this means working with Docker containers, writing Bash and Python scripts, modifying HTML files, crafting malicious Linux commands, etc..
   

  

**Requirements**
**Required Qualifications:**
* Strong Linux administration and automation skills (Bash, Python, PowerShell)
* Hands-on experience with penetration testing tools (Metasploit, Burp Suite, Nessus, Nmap)
* Knowledge of AI security risks, including prompt injection, adversarial attacks, and AI red teaming
* Experience in automating security tasks, securing DevOps workflows, and integrating security into CI/CD pipelines
* Cloud security expertise (AWS, Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD security)
* Relevant security certifications (OSCP, CEH, CISSP, OSWE, API Security Architect)
* Proficiency in English: advanced (C1) or above
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
* Strong communication skills for reporting findings and collaborating with teams
* Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


**Preferred Skills:**
* Experience in AI red teaming, adversarial ML, LLM security testing
* Deep understanding of networking protocols, OS security, and web application security
* Knowledge of OWASP Top Ten, MITRE ATT&CK, and other security frameworks
* Experience with web security (HTTP, API security, web scraping, DOM manipulation)


**Benefits**
* Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that works with your schedule and commitments
* Be part of an exciting AI project
* Enrich your portfolio with new experience
* Make a tangible impact on the quality of AI

title: Senior Testare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Aktivt delta i agila och projektmöten
* Genomföra, leda, koordinera och rapportera projektets test- och kvalitetssäkringsarbete
* Ta fram, dokumentera och implementera projektets övergripande teststrategi, testplan och testrapport utifrån testprocess och riktlinjer
* Leda, stödja och delta i arbetet med att ta fram nödvändig testdata och test-dokumentation för samtliga testaktiviteter
* Planera, genomföra, leda och rapportera delar av testaktiviteter vid UAT och End-to-end-tester med flera inblandade leverantörer


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Högskole/universitetsutbildning 120p/180hp inom IT/Data eller minst 5 års arbetslivs erfarenhet inom IT och Data
* ISTQB certifiering eller diplomerad kurs inom testledning
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet som testledare av IT-system under de senaste 10 åren
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet som testledare med IT-system baserat på UNIX/LINUX/Windows-plattform
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet som testare av verksamhetskritiska eller driftkritiska system under de senaste 5 åren
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet som både testare och testledare i ett internationellt projekt med dataflöden mellan olika länder under de senaste 8 åren


**Meriterande**
* Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Azur DevOps och/eller Jira som testverktyg
* Minst 1 års erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med flödesbaserade processer
* Minst 1 års erfarenhet av transmissionssystem
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet på en myndighet under de senaste 10 åren


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 19-02-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: ETL Developer
ETL Developer
Scandic Hotels Tech Trainee Program 2025/2026
description:
***Scandic Hotels Tech Trainee Program 2025/2026***




  





**Application Deadline:** 
 Feb. 26, 2025
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm
 



  





**Kickstart your career in Software Engineering & Coding with our Tech Trainee Program!** 




  





**About Scandic:** 




 Scandic is the largest hotel operator in the Nordics, with around 280 hotels and 58,000 rooms across six countries. We’re on an exciting journey, growing stronger every day and reshaping how guests experience our brand. With strong momentum, we’re creating seamless, engaging, and intuitive digital experiences that drive both business growth and customer loyalty. Join us and be part of a team that's creating the next-generation digital customer journey!
 



  





 You will be part of Group IT and our headquarters, a European function, even though we have most of our presence in the Nordics. Our HQ is situated in newly renovated spaces, of course with a wonderful hotel vibe ;) right by Hagaparken on Sveavägen in Stockholm. We love to be in the office but are a flexible workplace and offer a hybrid setup that suits our team members. Join in on our warm and inclusive culture and take part in all our different social activities.
 



  





 Scandic Hotels is highly committed and proactive when it comes to Diversity and Inclusion (D&I) initiatives. We are also a responsible corporate citizen and actively engaged in sustainability efforts. Joining Scandic Hotels means becoming a force for good.
 



  





**Scandic Tech Trainee Program:** 




 The program spans over a year, starting in September. You will build a solid foundation in IT and Tech. You will be part of our Customer Journey tech department while also having the opportunity to familiarize yourself with our hotels by visiting different locations multiple times during the year. Additionally, you will gain an understanding of various aspects within our IT department and collaborate with other relevant stakeholders and teams.
 



  





 Your home base will be our tech department called Customer Journey, where we have our web & app, CRM, Loyalty, API & Integration, and more. We work with modern technologies and processes, including Azure cloud, .NET, Javascript, TypeScript, Next.js 15, React Native, React, Kubernetes et.c. We work agile with devops principles and test automation.
 



  





 You will be part of a small group of Tech Trainees and other young talents within our organization and engage in training, learning and networking activities. You will be supported by several people in our organization including your team lead, other developers, our tech trainees from this year, a mentor and more. This program is small and we customize it as much as possible to set you up for success. The plan is for you to continue as a Software Engineer with us at Scandic after completing the program.
 



  





**Skills & Requirements** 




**Who are you?** 



* Do you want to be part of shaping the future hospitality experience with us? Are you eager to grow and learn? Do you want to be part of a great and diverse tech team? Cool! Please read further and apply.
* You hold or are pursuing a bachelor’s or master's degree in computer science, software engineering or similar. You will need to have your degree before the program starts.
* You think coding and software engineering is super fun and would like to start your career within this field.
* You have no more than four years of professional experience in your field of study by the start date.
* You have a strong analytical ability and possess strong problem-solving skills.
* Proficiency in English is essential, Swedish or other Scandinavian language is a plus.



  





**How to Apply:** 




 We’re happy to see that you’ve made it this far, we can’t wait to get to know you better!
 



  





 When applying, please share:
 


* Your CV describing your experiences and skills, please include coding experience
* A short application letter describing why you are interested in joining our Tech Trainee Program
* A transcript of grades



  





 We welcome applications in either Swedish or English.
 



  





 All qualified applicants will be invited to assessments (personality test and logical thinking test) through our assessment partner Assessio.
 



  





 If you have ambitions to develop, we will give you the opportunity to grow in your role. The development opportunities within our organization are endless. We have a warm and friendly approach, and we love to welcome new members to our team!
 



  





**Important Dates:** 




 Application period: until 26th of February 2025. Please apply as soon as possible, applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and the recruitment may be finalized before the deadline if we find the right candidates.
 



  





 Program start: Our Tech Trainee Program will start in September 2025.
 



  





 Due to GDPR, we only accept applications through our website.
 



  





 We're excited to hear from you soon!
 



  





**Contact Person** 




 Jenny Holmberg
 



 jenny.holmberg@scandichotels.com

title: Junior Data Engineer to listed industry leader in northern Europe
description:
***Junior Data Engineer to listed industry leader in northern Europe***




  





 The Group Data Platform team, which operates as the central data team in the MEKO sphere, is looking for a junior data engineer to strengthen our ranks. In this role you will join a strong and driven team with the goal of helping our business become more data driven.
 



  





 As a part of this journey, we are looking for someone who is passionate about data and has true interest in building high-quality data pipelines and is capable of building data models that support more than one stakeholder.
 



  





*MEKO consists of northern Europe's leading car service chains with their own wholesale operations, with more than 600 stores and almost 4,500 workshops operating under the Group's brands. We offer a wide and easily accessible range of affordable and innovative services, solutions and products for workshops and car owners.* 




  





**High level description:** 



* Work operationally with your colleagues in the data team to build new data products and use cases in a broad sense: everything from infrastructure, DevOps, data engineering, modelling and visualization. We do not expect you to know all these topics, but you should be willing to approach and learn them with our support.
* Work together with business stakeholders across the groups various companies in Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Poland, the Baltics and Finland.
* .Collaborate with analytics, sustainability, business development and other teams at MEKO to ensure that we deliver high quality data that can help them build a stronger MEKO



  





**Skills & Requirements** 




**You** 
 :
 


* We're looking for someone who thrives on learning and embraces technical challenges. You'll be working with our multi-faceted platform, so curiosity and adaptability are essential. We do not expect you to be an expert of everything (nor know it from the get-go), but you should be willing to try new technologies and learn!
* Technical degree of some kind within fields such as mathematics, computer science, engineering, or the natural sciences
* Interest in data engineering, visualization, distributed systems and building scalable and robust data driven products
* Willing to collaborate and both give and receive constructive feedback
* Experience programming in a major language, e.g., Python, JS, Java, or similar
* Experience using databases of some kind and can write basic SQL
* Experience using version control, preferably git
* Able to communicate in English



  





**We expect you to:** 



* Help build products with a full-stack focus using Python, Spark, Snowflake, MongoDB, dbt and more
* Help set up and manage infrastructure with Docker, Kubernetes and Terraform
* Help build reproducible pipelines using Airflow and Databricks
* Be serious about delivering high quality code



  





**Nice to have:** 



* Experience with web development
* Experience with CI/CD
* Experience with agile ways of working
* Linux experience



  





**We offer:** 



* Opportunity to learn or apply a very broad range of skills across DevOps, IaC, orchestration, data engineering and visualization.
* Possibility to shape your role focus according to interest and skillset
* A culture of mentoring and constructive feedback through pair programming, code reviews and whiteboarding
* A friendly team with high-performing, fun and skilled colleagues to support you in your professional journey



  





**About MEKO** 




 MEKO has key strategic goals, moving forward, include building new revenue streams and optimizing current operations. To ensure this, Group Data Platform team has been tasked with building and running a central data platform with modern infrastructure that ensures data governance and security while working alongside an organization-wide D365 ERP adaptation which gives us a unique opportunity to set data definitions, processes across all business units.
 



  





**Current tech stack:** 
 Snowflake, Airflow, python, dbt, Kubernetes, Terraform.
 



  





 For us at MEKO diversity is a part of our everyday life. We therefore strive for a higher representation of employees with an international background, a more even gender distribution and an age structure that best represents our customers.
 



  





 We believe in the potential to learn rather than ticking the boxes so even if you do not have the exact skill set mentioned but have interest and passion towards data and have an engineering mindset go ahead and submit your application.
 



  





 If you have any questions, please contact hiring manager at, satya.vardhini.pulla@meko.com.
 



  





 Applications and selection will be handled on an ongoing basis, so employment may be made before the advertisement period has expired.
 



  





 Personality is important to us! That's why we ask everyone who applies for a job to take a short personality test. It gives us the opportunity to get a more objective picture of you as a person and will be used as part of the decision-making in the selection process.
 **The link to the test is sent out in a separate email the day after you submit your application and we would like to ask you to answer the test as soon as you can.** 




  





**Handling of personal data** 
 . MEKO Services AB org.nr. 556840-9428, is the data controller for the processing of your personal data in connection with this recruitment. Read our policy on how we process your personal data: https://www.mekonomen.se/site...
 



  





**Welcome with your application!** 




  





**About the company** 




***We enable mobility – today, tomorrow and in the future.***




*MEKO AB consists of northern Europe's leading spare parts distributors; FTZ, Inter-Team, Koivunen, MECA, Mekonomen and Sørensen og Balchen with operation in Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Latvia, Lithuania, Norway, Poland and Sweden.* 




  





*Under our strong brands and concepts in each market the business focuses on growth, collaboration, synergy extraction and on driving sustainable and digital development. MEKO's business concept is timeless with stable demand and is based on enabling mobility - today, tomorrow and in the future - as technology develops and vehicles are used in new ways.* 




  





*MEKO meets the need for services and products for workshops and other companies through market-leading concepts, efficient logistics chain and an extensive distribution network consisting of more than 600 branches and 4,500 workshops. The Group's concept are also aimed at vehicle owners, both private individuals and companies, where we meet the need for service and repair of vehicles.* 




  





**Contact Person** 




 Satya Vardhini Pulla
 



 satya.vardhini.pulla@meko.com

title: Ubuntu Engineering Delivery and Excellence Manager
description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1100+ colleagues in 75+ countries and very few office based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.
   

  

 The company is founder led, profitable and growing.
   

  

 We are hiring a Quality Engineering Manager for our Ubuntu Quality Engineering team, with an impactful mission to take our Linux distro quality to a new level through automation and large-scale data analysis.
   

  

 As the Ubuntu Quality Engineering Manager, you must be an experienced engineer who has built large-scale software quality assurance frameworks, is passionate about the future of Ubuntu, mindful of the dynamics of the open source ecosystem, and equally aware of mission-critical requirements related to shipping the best Linux distro to users and partners world-wide. You will work closely with the various teams involved in creating Ubuntu and influence their practices to improve quality in every step of Ubuntu engineering. Your goal is to rethink the way a Linux distro approaches quality - bringing together automation, third-party analysis tooling, feedback loops from the community and user base, and our own test capabilities. Your team will monitor, develop and improve the quality of the Ubuntu System, to drive quality excellence and best DevOps practices among Ubuntu Desktop, Server, Containers and VM at package, system, and cluster levels.
   

  

 As every engineering manager at Canonical, your role is technical but your focus is your team. You are expected to help them grow as engineers, do important and satisfying work, and work well with colleagues and the community. Technical leadership experience and experience as a software engineer are necessary prerequisites for this role. You will be expected to lead, challenge, and develop strong engineers, positively influence the culture, facilitate technical delivery, and work with your team on strategy and execution.
   

  

 Location: Global worldwide
   

  

 The role entails
   

  

* Define and monitor quality metrics for the most popular Linux distro in the world
* Set and manage expectations with other engineering teams, management, and external stakeholders
* Advocate and advance modern, agile software development practices
* Develop and evangelize great engineering and organizational practices
* Setup and maintain continuous integration for all supported deliverables
* Develop a team with a culture of high quality and performance
* Work from home with international travel twice per year for up to two weeks


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* You have a strong software engineering, Linux, and open source background
* Your technical knowledge includes C/C++, Python programming, and Shell scripting
* You have experience with quality processes and continuous integration tools and principles
* You have engineering management experience and enjoy growing people
* You are a strong proponent of data-driven decision making


 Nice-to-have skills
   

  

* A good understanding of Debian packaging and snaps will be valuable
* Familiarity with an agile development environment


 What we offer colleagues
   

  

 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

 Canonical is an equal opportunity employer
   

  

 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Java Software Engineer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and IT System Custom Software Development
description:

 My client, a fast growing Boutique consultancy, based in the heart of Stockholm to scale their business massively over the next year.
